TEXT.TITLE: COMBUSTION <CSP> COMPLETES ACCURAY <ACRA> BUY
TEXT.BODY: Combustion Engineering Inc said it has completed the previously-announced acquisition of AccuRay Corp in a merger trasaction that closed Friday at 45 dlrs per share. Reuter
